org.openimaj.image.processing.face.detection

Class DetectedFace

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.processing.face.detection.DetectedFace
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReadableBinary, ReadWriteableBinary, WriteableBinary
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CCDetectedFace, CLMDetectedFace, EllipticalDetectedFace, KEDetectedFace, MultiTracker.TrackedFace

    public class DetectedFace
extends Object
implements ReadWriteableBinary
    A DetectedFace models a face detected by a face detector, together with the locations of certain facial features localised on the face.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Rectangle bounds
      The upright bounds of the face in the image in which it was detected
      protected float confidence
      The confidence of the detection; higher numbers mean higher confidence.
      protected FImage facePatch
      The extracted sub-image representing the face.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DetectedFace()
      Default constructor with an empty rectangle as bounds
      DetectedFace(Rectangle bounds, FImage patch, float confidence)
      Construct with a bounds rectangle (the bounding box of the face in the detection image) and an image patch that describes the contents of the bounds rectangle from the original image.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • bounds

        protected Rectangle bounds
        The upright bounds of the face in the image in which it was detected

      • facePatch

        protected FImage facePatch
        The extracted sub-image representing the face. This is normally extracted directly from the bounds rectangle in the original image, but in some cases might be extracted from a sub-region of the bounds rectangle.

      • confidence

        protected float confidence
        The confidence of the detection; higher numbers mean higher confidence.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DetectedFace

        public DetectedFace()
        Default constructor with an empty rectangle as bounds

      • DetectedFace

        public DetectedFace(Rectangle bounds,
                    FImage patch,
                    float confidence)
        Construct with a bounds rectangle (the bounding box of the face in the detection image) and an image patch that describes the contents of the bounds rectangle from the original image.
        Parameters:
        bounds - The bounding box of the face in the detection image.
        patch - The subimage describing the contents of the bounding box.
        confidence - The confidence of the detection.

    • Method Detail

      • getFacePatch

        public FImage getFacePatch()
        Returns the sub-image representing the face.
        Returns:
        Get the sub-image representing the detected face

      • setFacePatch

        public void setFacePatch(FImage img)
        Reset the face patch image
        Parameters:
        img - The image

      • getBounds

        public Rectangle getBounds()
        Get the bounding box of the face in the detection image. This might be the same as the shape returned by getShape(), or it might encompass that shape.
        Returns:
        The bounding box of the face in the detection image

      • setBounds

        public void setBounds(Rectangle rect)
        Set the bounds of this face. This is so that detected face objects can be updated if the bounds were inaccurate, or tracking is taking place on the object.
        Parameters:
        rect - The new bounds

      • writeBinary

        public void writeBinary(DataOutput out)
                 throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: WriteableBinary
        Write the content of this as binary to out.

        Throws:

        public byte[] binaryHeader()
        Description copied from interface: ReadableBinary
        Header for binary input. Will be automatically read by IOUtils when using readBinary().
        Specified by:
        binaryHeader in interface ReadableBinary
        Specified by:
        binaryHeader in interface WriteableBinary
        Returns:
        header

      • readBinary

        public void readBinary(DataInput in)
                throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: ReadableBinary
        Read internal state from in.

        Parameters:

        Throws:

      • getConfidence

        public float getConfidence()
        Get the confidence of the detection. Higher numbers mean higher confidence.
        Returns:
        the confidence.

      • getShape

        public Shape getShape()
        Get the shape of the detection. In most cases, this will just return the bounds rectangle, however, subclasses can override to return a better geometric description of the detection area.
        Returns:
        the shape describing the detection in the original image.

      • setConfidence

        public void setConfidence(int confidence)
        Set the confidence of the detection. Higher numbers mean higher confidence.
        Parameters:
        confidence - the confidence.
